mapper.select: select count(distinct win.wine_id) from t_wine win inner join t_origin org on win.wine_origin_id = org.wine_origin_id left join t_country ctry on org.country_id = ctry.country_id left join t_wine_type wtype on win.wine_type_id = wtype.wine_type_id left join t_winery wry on win.winery_id = wry.winery_id

select distinct win.wine_id, win.wine_type_id, wtype.wine_type_name_eng as wine_type_name, win.wine_origin_id, org.region_name_eng as wine_origin_name, org.country_id, ctry.country_name_eng as country_name, win.winery_id, wry.winery_name_eng as winery_name, win.wine_name_eng, win.wine_name_chs, win.wine_name_cht, win.wine_img_id, win.updated_at from t_wine win inner join t_origin org on win.wine_origin_id = org.wine_origin_id left join t_country ctry on org.country_id = ctry.country_id left join t_wine_type wtype on win.wine_type_id = wtype.wine_type_id left join t_winery wry on win.winery_id = wry.winery_id
limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
